name: Super Ice
description:
Manual:

You are an Ice-Cube trying to get back to your home after being stolen by someone that likes cold beverages.

Controls:

Use the arrow keys or A and D to move left and right.

Use the Spacebar or the up key to jump.

Use the left joystick to move left and right.

Use any buttons on the right to jump.

Press Numpad 1 or L1 to lower the game-speed while playing.

Press Numpad 2 or R1 to increase the game-speed while playing.

Press ESC to exit fullscreen.

Credits:

Spirit Lamp: Developer

Gordon: Playtester
